The [[Zero-Tails]] can create a multitude of tan coloured arms from its body that chase after the opponent. The arms can also absorb chakra from the opponent. When used by Shinnō, he could also form a wall to shield himself with these arms, enough to block [[Naruto]]'s [[Tornado Rasengan]].
